industry: Transportation, Logistics, Supply Chain and Storage
description:
John Tillman Company, a division of Bunzl, is seeking a Senior Buyer/Planner for our office in Compton, CA. As a top manufacturer of quality welding gloves and leather protective garments, Tillman is a brand that is well-known in the industry. The Senior Buyer/Planner will be responsible for the purchasing of production materials and MRO materials, as well as planning work orders and other activities to ensure accurate ERP planning messages. This position is responsible for all products and vendors assigned, along with coordinating the transportation of items in a cost-effective and timely manner.

At Bunzl, we know that our employees are our number one asset. We seek to recruit and retain the right people who are passionate about our business, and we provide opportunities for our employees so that they may progress within our company based on their talents, experiences, and their aptitude.

Responsibilities:

  • Communicate with the Operations team, manufacturers, and suppliers
  • Materials demand generation and sourcing low-cost suppliers
  • Negotiate prices and terms with manufacturers and suppliers
  • Monitor inventory levels/inventory control among two warehouses

Requirements:

  • Bachelor's degree preferred
  • Excellent communication skills (verbal and written)
  • Previous experience with SAGE preferred.
  • 5 years or more of experience in purchasing, sourcing, and price negotiation; import/export experience is a plus
  • Proficient in business negotiations, sales analysis, trend forecasting, and item management
  • Excellent negotiation skills
  • ERP systems experience required
  • Computer savvy, organized, self-motivated, and works well in a team environment
  • Strong Excel skills and planning skills are needed
  • Ability to foresee potential problems and work to solve them
  • Must be able to multi-task, be detail-oriented, and be a problem solver

Tillman salary range: $90k-$115K based on experience, education, and geographic location.

Bunzl is a global leader in the Cleaning & Hygiene, Food Processing, Grocery, Health Care, Non-Food Retail, and Safety industries. We have grown both organically and through acquisitions to sales in excess of $10 billion. Bunzl North America is headquartered in St. Louis, Missouri. Bunzl North America owns and operates more than 100 warehouses and serves all 50 states, Puerto Rico, Canada, and parts of the Caribbean and Mexico. With more than 7,000 employees and 400,000 plus supplies, Bunzl is regarded as a leading supplier in North America.

So, what are you waiting for? A new career awaits you with endless opportunities.
